subject: College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Michael Terry scored a touchdown with 22 seconds left and Valdosta State beat Northwest Missouri State, 25-20, for the N.C.A.A. Division II championship in Florence, Ala. Terry’s 1-yard touchdown run capped an eight-play, 37-yard drive fueled by Willie Copeland’s four straight completions for 27 yards. Valdosta (13-1) overcame a 14-3 halftime deficit in dropping Northwest Missouri to 12-2.
